licenses.name: ODC-PDDL-1.0
licenses.title: Open Data Commons Public Domain Dedication and License v1.0

fields.name: name
fields.description: a lower case hyphenated name of the portal

fields.name: title
fields.description: A human readable name of the portal

fields.name: url
fields.description: The URL of the open data portal

fields.name: author
fields.description: The organization/person primarily responsible for creating the data in the portal

fields.name: publisher
fields.description: The organization/person primarily responsible for publishing the data in the portal

fields.name: issued
fields.description: The date the portal was first made available, if known

fields.name: publisher_classification
fields.description: The organizational category that the publisher falls under

fields.name: description
fields.description: A brief description of the data contained within the portal

fields.name: tags
fields.description: List of tags that will aid users in searching for this portal

fields.name: license_id
fields.description: A short code which respresents the type of license for the portal

fields.name: license_url
fields.description: A link to the portal license if available

fields.name: place
fields.description: The name of the author/publisher's geographic location

fields.name: location
fields.description: The latitude,longitude in decimal degrees of the author/publisher's geographic location

fields.name: country
fields.description: The country name of the author/publisher's geographic location

fields.name: language
fields.description: The primary language used at the portal

fields.name: status
fields.description: This indicates whether the portal is currently available (active) or offline (inactive)

fields.name: metadatacreated
fields.description: The date this metadata was created

fields.name: generator
fields.description: The platform the portal is based on, if known

fields.name: api_endpoint
fields.description: The URL of the api endpoint for the portal

fields.name: api_type
fields.description: The type of API the portal is providing

fields.name: full_metadata_download
fields.description: The URL for downloading the portal metadata
